arts.ttl: Ireland boss details what Cristiano Ronaldo said to him immediately after his red card
arts.sum: Troy Parrott's double against Portugal put the Republic of Ireland in the driving seat in their World Cup qualifying group on what was a disastrous night for Cristiano Ronaldo

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo facing World Cup ban after red card for elbowing Ireland star
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo was sent off during Portugal's World Cup qualifier against Ireland on Thursday night as his team missed a chance to clinch qualification for the World Cup

arts.ttl: France qualifies for 2026 World Cup; Ronaldo sent off as Portugal loses to Ireland
arts.sum: But Ronaldo was ejected and Portugal will have to wait till Sunday to try and secure a qualifying spot for the seventh straight time after it was stunned 2-0 by Ireland in Dublin. Cristiano Ronaldo might now be banned from Portugal’s first game there if his team finally wins its European qualifying group.

arts.ttl: Video highlights: Ireland vs. Portugal (2-0): Ronaldo sent off as Portugal slump
arts.sum: Below you’ll find a video summary of the Ireland vs. Portugal match, including goals from Troy Parrott. As part of the 2026 World Cup qualifiers, Portugal faced Ireland at the Estádio Aviva on Thursday. Three Paris Saint-Germain players were involved in this match, all playing for Portugal: Vitinha (25-year-old midfielder), João Neves (21-year-old midfielder), and […]

arts.ttl: Republic of Ireland boss admits he may have got in Cristiano Ronaldo’s head
arts.sum: The Portugal superstar was dismissed in the World Cup qualifying match in Dublin on Thursday.

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo mocked by Ireland fans after almighty red-card strop in Dublin defeat
arts.sum: The Portugal striker was sent off in the 61st minute of his side’s 2-0 loss to the Republic of Ireland

arts.ttl: Ireland boss Heimir Hallgrimsson reveals Cristiano Ronaldo conversation after Portugal star sees red
arts.sum: Legend lost his head after Dublin dismissal

arts.ttl: Ronaldo sees red as Republic of Ireland stun Portugal in World Cup qualifying
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo was sent off as Republic of Ireland stunned Portugal with a 2-0 win and forced Roberto Martinez's side to wait to qualify for the 2026 World Cup.

arts.ttl: CR7 sees red as Parrott brace boosts Republic of Ireland's World Cup dream
arts.sum: Troy Parrott scores twice as Republic of Ireland record a 2-0 victory over 10-man Portugal in Thursday night's 2026 World Cup qualification fixture in Dublin.

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo sent off as Troy Parrott’s brace earns Ireland famous victory
arts.sum: Ireland head for Hungary on Sunday knowing victory would secure runners-up spot in Group F.
